roleset.name: cause to have knowledge
roleset.note: ENLIGHTEN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'enlighten' based on sentences in wsj; adjectival 'enlightening' based on BOLT-6. Member of VNcls amuse-31.1 (from enlighten.01-v)
ENLIGHTENING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from enlightening.01-j)

example.name: all args
example.text: To some extent, this tendency emerges whenever [the show]-2 tries [*-2]to enlighten us about ethnic stereotypes by reversing them.

example.name: Adjectival rel: enlightening
example.text: Du Jie 's path of transformation from a young scholar to a corrupt cadre is enlightening .
example.arg: Du Jie 's path of transformation from a young scholar to a corrupt cadre
